Description: Bust of Hadrian, bare, left, with drapery on right shoulder and behind. (obverse)
Egypt reclining left, holding sistrum in right hand and resting left arm on basket, in front of her, ibis. Snake coils round basket, right. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Bibliographic references: RE3 / Coins of the Roman Empire in the British Museum, vol.III: Nerva to Hadrian (796, p.341)
RIC2 / The Roman imperial coinage, vol. 2: Vespasian to Hadrian (296) (type)
Strack (Hadrian) / Die Reichspraegung zur Zeit des Hadrian (294)
RIC2.3 / The Roman Imperial Coinage, vol. II - part 3 from AD 117-138 Hadrian (1476)
